summary: Machine learning is a subfield of artificial intelligence focused on building systems that learn from data.

options: A) A way to program robots only
B) A field focused on data-driven learning algorithms
C) The same as traditional programming
quiz.explanation: Machine learning builds algorithms that can learn from and make predictions on data.

quiz.text: Which algorithm is NOT commonly used in machine learning?
quiz.explanation: Bubble Sort is a sorting algorithm, not a learning model.
